Подключение библиотек:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```

Загрузка данных:
```{r}
water = read_sheet('1qpvu21VCsvz-hYu5s1h0fc-3mRpxvsF1Y2M0Ie3d3CU')
```
```{r}
agro = read_sheet('1HfJ-OOtGBWUnlp1vus8p2n8lXusowsNWflyqMHfXHCI') %>% 
  select(Country, `2002`)  %>%  
  mutate(`2002` = as.numeric(sapply(`2002`, function(x) {
    if (is.null(x)) return(NA)
        else return(x)
  })))

tab = left_join(water, agro, by = 'Country') %>% 
 rename(water = 2, agro = 3) %>% 
  mutate(agro = as.numeric(agro)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(water), !is.na(agro))
```

Диаграмма рассеяния:
```{r}
ggplot(tab, mapping = aes(x = water, y = agro)) +
  geom_point()
```
